titleStmt.title: A short view of the life and reign of King Charles (the second monarch of Great Britain) from his birth to his burial.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The life and reign of King Charles.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
